content.question: Which of the following best explains the overall trend in sugar consumption represented in the chart?

choices.label: The development of plantation colonies in the Caribbean
The commercialization of European agricultural production
The removal of traditional restrictions on consumption by governments and elites

content.answer: The development of plantation colonies in the Caribbean
